bug.author: dciborow
bug.summary: [BUG] azure_automl_forecast throws exception instead of creating compute
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9027725/75794899-79711b80-5d3f-11ea-8735-308ec90ddd02.png></denchmark-link>
ComputeTarget creation should be checked, (not caught in except), and if it is not created it should then be created.
